name: climate-change-news
description: This is a RESTful API that aggregates news articles related to climate change from various reputable sources on the web. It provides endpoints to fetch general climate change news as well as news from specific newspapers.

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Thank you for installing climate-change-news! If you find this package helpful, please consider giving it a star on GitHub: https://github.com/LaXnZ/climate-change-news-api'

author: sumuditha lansakara
